price: Isaaniif Jahannam irraa firaashiitu jira, gubbaa isaaniitii immoo haguuggiitu (jira). Akka kanatti miidhaa raawwattoota (adabaan) galata galchina..
arabic: لَهُم مِّن جَهَنَّمَ مِهَادٞ وَمِن فَوۡقِهِمۡ غَوَاشٖۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: lahum min jahannama mihādun wamin fawqihim ghawāshin wakadhālika najzī al-ẓālimīna
